recount3 0.99.0

  • Changelog

Read the metadata files

Source: R/read_metadata.R
read_metadata.Rd

This function reads in the recount3 metadata files into R. You can first locate the files using file_locate_url() then download it to your computer using file_retrieve().

read_metadata(metadata_files)

Arguments

metadata_files

A character() with the local path to recount3 metadata files.

Value

A data.frame() with all lower case column names for the sample metadata.

See also

Other internal functions for accessing the recount3 data: annotation_ext(), create_rse_manual(), file_locate_url_annotation(), file_locate_url(), file_retrieve(), project_home_available(), read_counts()

Examples


## Download the metadata files for project ERP110066
url_ERP110066_meta <- file_locate_url(
    "ERP110066",
    "data_sources/sra"
)
local_ERP110066_meta <- file_retrieve(
    url = url_ERP110066_meta
)

#> 2020-09-28 02:43:51 caching file sra.sra.ERP110066.MD.gz.
#> adding rname 'http://idies.jhu.edu/recount3/data/human/data_sources/sra/metadata/66/ERP110066/sra.sra.ERP110066.MD.gz'
#> 2020-09-28 02:43:52 caching file sra.recount_project.ERP110066.MD.gz.
#> adding rname 'http://idies.jhu.edu/recount3/data/human/data_sources/sra/metadata/66/ERP110066/sra.recount_project.ERP110066.MD.gz'
#> 2020-09-28 02:43:53 caching file sra.recount_qc.ERP110066.MD.gz.

## Read the metadata
ERP110066_meta <- read_metadata(local_ERP110066_meta)

#> Warning: Replacing study_acc by study in sra.sra.ERP110066.MD.gz

## Read the metadata files for a project in a collection
## Note: using the test files since I can't access collections right now
## for this collection
ERP110066_collection_meta <- read_metadata(
    metadata_files = file_retrieve(
        file_locate_url(
            "ERP110066",
            "collections/geuvadis_smartseq",
            recount3_url = "http://snaptron.cs.jhu.edu/data/temp/recount3"
        )
    )
)

#> 2020-09-28 02:43:54 caching file geuvadis_smartseq.recount_project.gz.
#> 2020-09-28 02:43:55 caching file sra.sra.ERP110066.MD.gz.
#> 2020-09-28 02:43:55 caching file sra.recount_project.ERP110066.MD.gz.
#> 2020-09-28 02:43:56 caching file sra.recount_qc.ERP110066.MD.gz.
#> Warning: The 'url' <http://snaptron.cs.jhu.edu/data/temp/recount3/human/data_sources/sra/metadata/66/ERP110066/sra.recount_seq_qc.ERP110066.MD.gz> does not exist or is not available.
#> 2020-09-28 02:43:56 caching file sra.recount_pred.ERP110066.MD.gz.
#> 2020-09-28 02:43:56 caching file geuvadis_smartseq.custom.gz.
dim(ERP110066_collection_meta)

#> [1]   1 161
## New columns for this collection
colnames(ERP110066_collection_meta)[!colnames(ERP110066_collection_meta) %in% colnames(ERP110066_meta)]

#> [1] "custom.sequencing_type"

## Read the metadata for a mouse project
DRP002367_meta <- read_metadata(
    metadata_files = file_retrieve(
        file_locate_url("DRP002367", "data_sources/sra", organism = "mouse")
    )
)

#> 2020-09-28 02:43:57 caching file sra.sra.DRP002367.MD.gz.
#> 2020-09-28 02:43:57 caching file sra.recount_project.DRP002367.MD.gz.
#> 2020-09-28 02:43:57 caching file sra.recount_qc.DRP002367.MD.gz.
#> 2020-09-28 02:43:57 caching file sra.recount_seq_qc.DRP002367.MD.gz.
#> 2020-09-28 02:43:58 caching file sra.recount_pred.DRP002367.MD.gz.

#> Warning: Replacing run_acc by external_id in sra.sra.DRP002367.MD.gz
#> Warning: Replacing study_acc by study in sra.recount_qc.DRP002367.MD.gz
#> Warning: Replacing run_acc by external_id in sra.recount_qc.DRP002367.MD.gz

## Locate and read the GTEx bladder metadata
gtex_bladder_meta <- read_metadata(
    file_retrieve(
        file_locate_url("BLADDER", "data_sources/gtex")
    )
)
